name: Marshmallow Mayhem
description:
All the marshmallows want to be cooked and just don't know better! Chase as many as you can away from your campfire so they can live to see another day!

Made in the GDQ One Mechanic Game Jam 6, December 2019

MECHANIC - The one mechanic is the player's movement, as they achieve the goal of the game through running towards marshmallows.

THEME - Campfire

ENGINE - Unity
